trans-unit.source: Provides services for formatting text and breaking text lines using a custom text layout client.
trans-unit.target: 使用自訂文字配置用戶端提供格式化文字和分隔文字行的服務。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter> is the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] text engine that provides services for formatting text and breaking text lines.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter> 是[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]提供服務，用於格式化文字和分隔文字行的文字引擎。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter> can handle different text character formats and paragraph styles, and includes support for international text layout.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter> 可以處理不同的文字字元格式和段落的樣式，並包含支援國際文字版面配置。

trans-unit.source: Unlike a traditional text [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api](~/includes/tlasharptla-api-md.md)], the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter> interacts with a text layout client through a set of callback methods.
trans-unit.target: 不同於傳統文字[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api](~/includes/tlasharptla-api-md.md)]、<xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter>與透過回呼方法的一組文字配置用戶端互動。

trans-unit.source: It requires the client to provide these methods in an implementation of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextSource> class.
trans-unit.target: 它需要用戶端提供這些方法的實作中<xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextSource>類別。

trans-unit.source: The following diagram illustrates the interaction of the text formatter client and the text layout client.
trans-unit.target: 下圖說明文字的格式器用戶端和文字配置用戶端互動。

trans-unit.source: ![Diagram of text layout client and TextFormatter](~/add/media/textformatter01.png "Diagram of text layout client and TextFormatter")
trans-unit.target: ![文字配置用戶端和 TextFormatter 的圖表](~/add/media/textformatter01.png "文字配置用戶端和 TextFormatter 的圖表")

trans-unit.source: Interaction between the text layout client and the TextFormatter object
trans-unit.target: 文字配置用戶端和 TextFormatter 物件之間的互動

trans-unit.source: Text Formatting Services
trans-unit.target: 文字格式設定的服務

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter> provides support for text features, such as OpenType typography, as well as support for text run, line, and paragraph level features.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter> 提供文字的功能，例如 OpenType 印刷樣式，以及支援執行文字、 線條與段落層級功能的支援。

trans-unit.source: The following table is a list of the key <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter> supported services for text features.
trans-unit.target: 下表是一份金鑰<xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter>支援文字功能的服務。

trans-unit.source: Feature
trans-unit.target: 功能

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Background brush
trans-unit.target: 背景筆刷

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brush> that is used for the background color.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brush>所用的背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunProperties.BackgroundBrush%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱 <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunProperties.BackgroundBrush%2A> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Baseline alignment
trans-unit.target: 基準線對齊方式

trans-unit.source: Determines the baseline distance of the line.
trans-unit.target: 決定線條的基準距離。

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunProperties.BaselineAlignment%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱 <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunProperties.BaselineAlignment%2A> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Font linking
trans-unit.target: 字型連結

trans-unit.source: Provides font linking through the use of composite fonts.
trans-unit.target: 提供連結使用複合字型的字型。

trans-unit.source: Foreground brush
trans-unit.target: 前景筆刷

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brush> that is used for the foreground color.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brush>所用的前景色彩。

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunProperties.ForegroundBrush%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱 <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunProperties.ForegroundBrush%2A> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: OpenType
trans-unit.target: OpenType

trans-unit.source: Advanced OpenType typographic features, such contextual alternates and standard ligatures.
trans-unit.target: 進階的 OpenType 印刷樣式功能，這類內容替代字和標準連音符號。

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunTypographyProperties> class properties.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunTypographyProperties>類別內容。

trans-unit.source: Typeface
trans-unit.target: 字樣

trans-unit.source: Determines the typeface, as well as, weight, style, and stretch.
trans-unit.target: 決定字樣，以及，粗細、 樣式和自動縮放。

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunProperties.Typeface%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱 <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunProperties.Typeface%2A> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Text decoration
trans-unit.target: 文字裝飾

trans-unit.source: Provides support for <xref:System.Windows.TextDecoration> objects, such as underline or strikethrough.
trans-unit.target: 提供的支援<xref:System.Windows.TextDecoration>物件，例如底線或刪除線。

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunProperties.TextDecorations%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱 <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunProperties.TextDecorations%2A> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Text effects
trans-unit.target: 文字效果

trans-unit.source: Provides support for <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextEffect> objects.
trans-unit.target: 提供的支援<xref:System.Windows.Media.TextEffect>物件。

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunProperties.TextEffects%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱 <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunProperties.TextEffects%2A> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following table is a list of the key <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter> supported services for paragraph-level features.
trans-unit.target: 下表是一份金鑰<xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter>支援段落層級功能的服務。

trans-unit.source: Feature
trans-unit.target: 功能

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Flow direction
trans-unit.target: 流程方向

trans-unit.source: Flow direction of the paragraph—left-to-right, or right-to-left.
trans-unit.target: 資料流程方向段落 — 左到右或從右到左。

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextParagraphProperties.FlowDirection%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱 <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextParagraphProperties.FlowDirection%2A> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Line indentation
trans-unit.target: 行縮排

trans-unit.source: Indentation for each line in the paragraph.
trans-unit.target: 段落中的每一行的縮排。

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextParagraphProperties.Indent%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱 <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextParagraphProperties.Indent%2A> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Marker
trans-unit.target: 標記

trans-unit.source: Marker characteristics of the first line in the paragraph.
trans-unit.target: 標記特性的段落中的第一行。

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextParagraphProperties.TextMarkerProperties%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱 <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextParagraphProperties.TextMarkerProperties%2A> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Paragraph indentation
trans-unit.target: 段落縮排

trans-unit.source: Indentation for the first line in the paragraph.
trans-unit.target: 在一段中的第一行縮排。

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextParagraphProperties.ParagraphIndent%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱 <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextParagraphProperties.ParagraphIndent%2A> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Tabs
trans-unit.target: 定位點

trans-unit.source: Includes support for tab alignment and tab leader.
trans-unit.target: 包含支援的索引標籤對齊和定位點前置字元。

trans-unit.source: Width
trans-unit.target: 寬度

trans-unit.source: Determine minimum and maximum paragraph width.
trans-unit.target: 判斷最小和最大的段落寬度。

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter.FormatMinMaxParagraphWidth%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter.FormatMinMaxParagraphWidth%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Word wrap
trans-unit.target: 自動換行

trans-unit.source: Determine how text wraps when it reaches the flow edge.
trans-unit.target: 決定文字換行到達流程邊緣時。

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextParagraphProperties.TextWrapping%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱 <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextParagraphProperties.TextWrapping%2A> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following table is a list of the key <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter> supported services for line-level features.
trans-unit.target: 下表是一份金鑰<xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter>支援服務的程式行層級功能。

trans-unit.source: Feature
trans-unit.target: 功能

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Alignment
trans-unit.target: 對齊

trans-unit.source: Text alignment—left, right, centered, or justified.
trans-unit.target: 文字對齊 — 左、 右、 置中對齊或對齊。

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextParagraphProperties.TextAlignment%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱 <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextParagraphProperties.TextAlignment%2A> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Line height
trans-unit.target: 行高

trans-unit.source: Height of the line.
trans-unit.target: 線條的高度。

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine.Height%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱 <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine.Height%2A> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Line collapsing
trans-unit.target: 行摺疊

trans-unit.source: Line collapsing support.
trans-unit.target: 行摺疊支援。

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine.Collapse%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine.Collapse%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Black box measurement
trans-unit.target: 黑箱度量

trans-unit.source: Represents the metrics used to lay out a character in a device font.
trans-unit.target: 表示用於配置裝置字型字元的度量。

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics> class.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱 <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics> 類別。

trans-unit.source: Caret support
trans-unit.target: 插入號支援

trans-unit.source: Caret navigation and editing support.
trans-unit.target: 插入號巡覽和編輯支援。

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine> character hit properties, such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine.GetNextCaretCharacterHit%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine.GetPreviousCaretCharacterHit%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine>字元叫用屬性，例如<xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine.GetNextCaretCharacterHit%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine.GetPreviousCaretCharacterHit%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following table is a list of the key <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter> supported services for text run-level features.
trans-unit.target: 下表是一份金鑰<xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter>支援文字執行層級功能的服務。

trans-unit.source: Feature
trans-unit.target: 功能

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Hidden run
trans-unit.target: 隱藏的執行

trans-unit.source: Range of characters that are not visible.
trans-unit.target: 不會顯示的字元範圍。

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextHidden> object.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextHidden>物件。

trans-unit.source: Breaking
trans-unit.target: 中斷

trans-unit.source: Line and paragraph breaking.
trans-unit.target: 一行並段落中斷。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter> object to generate formatted lines of text that can be displayed as drawing objects.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter>物件來產生格式化可以顯示為繪製物件的文字行。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This is a static method.
trans-unit.target: 這是靜態方法。

trans-unit.source: A new instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter" /> 的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormattingMode" /> that specifies the text layout for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormattingMode" />，其指定了 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter" /> 的文字配置。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter" /> class with the specified formatting mode.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的格式化模式，建立 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This is a static method.
trans-unit.target: 這是靜態方法。

trans-unit.source: A new instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter" /> 的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Releases all managed and unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 釋放 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter" /> 物件使用的所有 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine" /> that is used for formatting and displaying document content.
trans-unit.target: 建立用於格式化和顯示文件內容的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextSource" /> value that represents the text source for the line.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextSource" /> 值，表示行的文字來源。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> value that specifies the character index of the starting character in the line.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> 值，表示行中開始字元的字元索引。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> value that specifies the width of the paragraph that the line fills.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Double" /> 值，表示填入行的段落寬度。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextParagraphProperties" /> value that represents paragraph properties, such as flow direction, alignment, or indentation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextParagraphProperties" /> 值，表示段落屬性，例如文字流向、對齊或縮排。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLineBreak" /> value that specifies the text formatter state, in terms of where the previous line in the paragraph was broken by the text formatting process.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLineBreak" /> 值，表示文字格式子狀態，是以文字格式化處理序在段落中前一行分行的位置來表示。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine" /> that is used for formatting and displaying document content.
trans-unit.target: 建立用於格式化和顯示文件內容的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine" /> value that represents a line of text that can be displayed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine" /> 值，表示可以顯示的文字行。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter.FormatLine%2A> method to return a formatted <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter.FormatLine%2A>方法以傳回格式化<xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine>。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextSource" /> object that represents the text source for the line.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextSource" /> 物件，表示行的文字來源。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> value that specifies the character index of the starting character in the line.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> 值，表示行中開始字元的字元索引。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> value that specifies the width of the paragraph that the line fills.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Double" /> 值，表示填入行的段落寬度。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextParagraphProperties" /> object that represents paragraph properties, such as flow direction, alignment, or indentation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextParagraphProperties" /> 物件，表示段落屬性，例如文字流向、對齊或縮排。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLineBreak" /> object that specifies the text formatter state, in terms of where the previous line in the paragraph was broken by the text formatting process.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLineBreak" /> 物件，表示文字格式子狀態，是以文字格式化處理序在段落中前一行分行的位置來表示。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunCache" /> object that represents the caching mechanism for the layout of text.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunCache" /> 物件，表示文字配置的快取機制。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine" /> that is used for formatting and displaying document content.
trans-unit.target: 建立用於格式化和顯示文件內容的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine" /> value that represents a line of text that can be displayed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine" /> 值，表示可以顯示的文字行。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to improve performance in applications where the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine> has significant performance implications.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來改善效能，應用程式在其中<xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine>有顯著的效能影響。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that represents the smallest and largest possible paragraph width that can fully contain the specified text content.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，代表可完整內含指定之文字內容的最小及最大可能段落的寬度。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextSource" /> object that represents the text source for the line.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextSource" /> 物件，表示行的文字來源。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> value that specifies the character index of the starting character in the line.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> 值，表示行中開始字元的字元索引。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextParagraphProperties" /> object that represents paragraph properties, such as flow direction, alignment, or indentation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextParagraphProperties" /> 物件，表示段落屬性，例如文字流向、對齊或縮排。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that represents the smallest and largest possible paragraph width that can fully contain the specified text content.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，代表可完整內含指定之文字內容的最小及最大可能段落的寬度。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.MinMaxParagraphWidth" /> value that represents the smallest and largest possible paragraph width that can fully contain the specified text content.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.MinMaxParagraphWidth" /> 值，表示可完整內含指定之文字內容的最小及最大可能段落的寬度。

trans-unit.source: The following text uses the minimum paragraph width for the source text, which displays as multiple lines.
trans-unit.target: 下列的文字使用之原始程式文字，後者會顯示為多行的最小段落寬度。

trans-unit.source: The minimum paragraph width corresponds to the word that has the greatest width—in this case, the word "jumped".
trans-unit.target: 最小段落寬度對應至具有最大寬度的文字，在此情況下，word"跳標籤 」。

trans-unit.source: Notice that multiple words can appear on the same line, as long as the total width does not exceed the minimum paragraph width.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，多個文字可以出現在同一行，只要總寬度不超過最小段落寬度。

trans-unit.source: ![Text Formatter using the minimum paragraph width](~/add/media/textformatter03.png "Text Formatter using the minimum paragraph width")
trans-unit.target: ![使用最小段落寬度的文字格式子](~/add/media/textformatter03.png "使用最小段落寬度的文字格式子")

trans-unit.source: Minimum paragraph width
trans-unit.target: 最小段落寬度

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter.FormatMinMaxParagraphWidth%2A> method to generate the minimum paragraph width for the formatted lines of text.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter.FormatMinMaxParagraphWidth%2A>方法來產生格式化的文字行的最小段落寬度。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextSource" /> object that represents the text source for the line.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextSource" /> 物件，表示行的文字來源。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> value that specifies the character index of the starting character in the line.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> 值，表示行中開始字元的字元索引。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextParagraphProperties" /> object that represents paragraph properties, such as flow direction, alignment, or indentation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextParagraphProperties" /> 物件，表示段落屬性，例如文字流向、對齊或縮排。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunCache" /> object that represents the caching mechanism for the layout of text.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunCache" /> 物件，表示文字配置的快取機制。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that represents the smallest and largest possible paragraph width that can fully contain the specified text content.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，代表可完整內含指定之文字內容的最小及最大可能段落的寬度。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.MinMaxParagraphWidth" /> value that represents the smallest and largest possible paragraph width that can fully contain the specified text content.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.MinMaxParagraphWidth" /> 值，表示可完整內含指定之文字內容的最小及最大可能段落的寬度。
